column4: is it better to do a fresh install of ibex or will an upgrade from a fresh install of hardy be the same? i just fresh installed hardy before i realize that theres 6 days left till ibex. i don't really want to download a whole new iso etc... if it would be the same as upgrading
I'd recommend doing a fresh install of Ibex. Theoretically, though, there won't be too much difference.
ThePandemic: they're both local? i.e. neither of those directories are on external drives?
